import axios from "axios"; import React, { Component, useState } from "react"; import Form from "react-validation/build/form"; import Input from "react-validation/build/input"; function AddTutorial(props) { const url = "http://localhost:3000/Tutorialapp"; const [tId, setTid] = useState(); const [tName, setTname] = useState(); const [tDesc, setTdesc] = useState(); const [tStatus, setTstatus] = useState(); const handleSubmit = () => { console.log("clicked submit"); axios .post(url, { tutorial_id: tId, tutorial_name: tName, tutorial_desc: tDesc, tutorial_status: tStatus, }) .then((res) => { alert("Add Tutorial"); }); }; return (
